It was a normal day in the lives of our couple Danielle and Rob, Rob was getting ready for work while Danielle laid peacefully in her bed. They were both twenty years old and deeply in love. Danielle is as a cute Burnet with brown eyes and a nicely fit body, Rob was well built and very curious, he also had an infatuation with Danielle's feet, which he though she had no idea, but she did. As Rob get's ready for work there is a knock at the door, so he finishes combing his hair and walks to answer the door. Oddly enough there was no one there, yet there was a small package at ther floor. He brings it inside and puts it on the counter. He finishes getting ready and walks back over to the package, he is very curious and opens it up. Suddenly there is a bright flash and Rob falls to the floor. He wakes up in a daze and to his surprise every thing looks massive! After a little bit of observation he realizes he has been shrunk! He is now merely micro sized and the box the had done this had mysteriously vanished. Rob was now concerned as to what he was going to do, now that the box has vanished, how does he have any hope of returning to normal!? Danielle will probably think he went to work for the day and have no concern!

What should Rob do?

112112.title: screamed, seeing no one there.

1121121.content:
Danielle did not even flinch as my voice was not loud enough, though I was screaming at the top of my lungs. I knew then that I would have to find some other means to talk to her if I was going to get any help at all. Looking around, I saw that it was getting dark and decided I had better get off Danielle and set up a base camp where I could plan out my next move.

"This is not like Rob." said Danielle, sounding worried. "I hope he's okay."

"I'm fine." I said, though she could not hear me. "I'll find a way to reach you, I promise."

Jumping off, I intended to grab the fabric of her blouse and climb down but Danielle suddenly turned to leave and I missed, plummeting down to the tile floor of the kitchen. SMACK! Dazed but not hurt, I shook my head and got up, "She was dusting myself off before watching my giantess girlfriend walking out of my apartment. "She'll be back tomorrow." I thought. "The plan was for her to move in with me."

Saddened but determined, I ran across the kitchen floor and was immediately surprised by how fast I was going. It was quite a rush moving at what seemed like super sonic speeds. I reached the far side of the kitchen in a heartbeat and continued on into the living room where I had built a Victorian doll house from scratch for my niece. I decided that would be my base of operations as everything was made real, just miniature sized. Everything worked, including the plumbing, which I thought was a nice touch, not to mention ironic.

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_u83-moRbaaM/S_...

I made it to the house without incident and walked inside the front door, very pleased and relieved that I was such a stricter for detail. Upon closing the door, I jumped, hearing a voice inside the living room of the doll house.

"You really go all out when you build something, don't you?" he asked in a raspy voice. "I'm impressed, I wish I had something like this when I was watching over my daughter, it would have made the job a lot easier."

"Who are you!?" I demanded. "Did you have anything to do with me being like this!?"

The man grunted and stood up from the couch where I could see him. As he walked into the light, which I made to work as well, I recognized him as Danielle's missing father, Jon. "What!?!"

"Since you asked nicely, young man, I'll tell you." said Jon. "Yes, I'm the one who sent you that package of dust that shrank you to the size you are now."

"Why!?" I demanded, wanting to strangle Danielle's father. "What reason do you have to do this to me!?"

"Don't panic, the process is reversible!" said Jon, sternly. "You can switch back and forth between sizes, once I give you the formula for the dust and the antidote." he paused, taking a breath. "Why I did this is simple, my daughter, Danielle, has been cursed to forever be in danger."

"What!?" I asked, startled. "Who, why!?"

"She was cursed by a woman who wanted me but lost to my late wife." replied Jon, sadly. "I do not know how to remove the curse and the woman who placed it onto Danielle died as the curse works both ways."

"By cursing your daughter, she cursed herself as well." I said, guessing. "You've shrunken yourself to protect her?"

Jon nodded. "Through the years, I have protected her, unseen, so she would never feel threatened." he said. "Only now, I'm too old and must pass the torch. I returned to normal size to create a batch of dust to shrink you down for the task."

I sighed, not liking where Jon was going with his words. "I want to raise a family with Danielle." I protested.

"You still can." replied Jon, with a sigh. "Just don't let her see you shrink or grow."

"What am I up against here?" I asked.

Jon shrugged. "Demons as tall as you and I are right now." he said. "Droves of them will attack Danielle at once, causing her to trip, become ill, anything to harm her or terrify her."

"That sounds impossible." I stated. "Anything in my favor?"

Jon smiled. "It's not impossible." he said. "In your normal state, you will sense them coming and in your shrunken state, you will will be super human compared to your size as you keep your normal strength and speed." he paused. "Are you interested or not."

After a thought, I replied, "Okay, I'm in."

112112112.content:
There were more demons coming in from cracks in the walls and floors, all running towards her feet, about twenty altogether and I feared that I would not be able to defeat them all before they did something to Danielle. Remembering the antidote Jon had given me and his instructions of how to use it, I took up a small bottle from my pocket. She can not see me grow or shrink, how can I do this?" I asked myself.

Getting an idea, I ran forward and rammed the chair Danielle was in, causing it to suddenly move a few inches. This forced a low scream from Danielle which I used to quickly hit myself with the power inside the bottle, returning me to my normal size in seconds. "Hey, honey, sorry if I startled you." I said, quickly taking her into my arms.

"Rob, what!?!" asked Danielle, surprised.

I laughed, dancing her around as she held onto her cereal bowl. She laughed with me, unaware that I was stomping the shit out of the little demons that had planned to do who knows what. "I have some wonderful news, honey." I said, finally putting her down. "I snagged a great job at the research company, just outside of town."

"That's where dad worked before his disappeared." she said, sadly. "I don't want that to happen to you too."

"I'm really not allowed to tell you this, but you deserve to know." I said, causing Danielle to become curious. "Your dad was promoted and had been working undercover for the government, he was not allowed any ties with his family in fear that they may become targets."

All of what I had said to Danielle was the truth, minus the government involvement but she accepted it, slowly nodding as she let out a low sigh. "I thought it might have been along those lines." she said. "How did you snag this job?"

"Your dad offered it to me." I replied. "I may have to vanish on you from time to time as my job requires me to leave at a seconds notice but..." I produced a gold coin that was worth nearly a thousand dollars and handed it to her. "The pay is well worth the frustration."

"This is a Spanish deblume." she said, surprised. "I had always wanted one to hold."

I lightly kissed Danielle on the forehead. "That is my gift to you." I said. "All I ask is your patience."

The Spanish deblume came from a large stash inside the walls and under the floor that I had discovered before my shrinking adventure. I had not taken them out as I had planned to use them as a retirement nest egg. Danielle placed her bowl aside and stood up before pulling me into a hug. "I think I can be a little patient." she said.

"Patience has its rewards, sweetie." said Jon's voice. Danielle and I turned to see Jon, back to his normal size. "I'm sorry I was not there for you over the years but I have been watching over you."

I nodded, confirming his words. "He has." I said. "Remember that incident when the car went out of control on us?"

Danielle nodded but did not speak and I added, "Dad had it investigated and found that the auto repair shop that fixed the car, sabotages their own repairs to keep the customers coming back."

"They fell under a federal inspection that very same day." said Jon. "Did you ever wonder why they went out of business after that incident?"

Danielle smiled and hugged him warmly. "I missed you, daddy." she said. "I missed you too, sugar." said Jon.
